analysis.description:
LuckCashCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#400-404) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#403-404)

Reentrancy in VestingFund.release (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#470-476):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount() (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#470-472)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#473)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#51-70) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#64)

LuckCashCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#400-404) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#403)

LuckCashCrowdsale.mintTokensFor (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#354-357) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#357)

LuckCashCrowdsale.createVestFundFor (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#364-378) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(fund,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#375-378)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0xb0fe6581875550421ed1fe4a9ea717fa4fb97308.sol#203-209) should be declared external
